sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: Generates a Violations report with a json blob
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Generates a Violations report with data defined by scope and filters. This request starts the report generation process which runs in the background. The returned report ID is used in other requests that require it such as Get Report Content, Delete Report, etc.

The returned report ID is used in other requests that require it such as Get Report Content, Delete Report, etc.
